specials.title: Black Friday
specials.details:
Arizona Natural Selections is celebrating Black Friday by offering huge doorbuster and deals during our 3rd annual “Green Friday” sale. These exclusive offerings are only available to the Arizona Natural Selections Family. We will have deals on everything from concentrates and flower to edibles and in-between.

In 2016 we gave away Black Friday doorbuster bundles to the first 50 patients at each of our dispensaries. Last year the first 75 patients at each store received a Black Friday Bundle. This year the first 150 PATIENTS at each of our locations on Black Friday are guaranteed to receive between $80 and $225 of FREE medicine with a $50 minimum medicated purchase.

Black Friday Opening Hours:

Scottsdale Location – 6:00 am

Mesa Location – 8:00am

Peoria Location – 8:00 am

We want to wish our patients a Happy Black Friday with exclusive mmj deals and giveaways.

specials.title: New Loyalty Program!
specials.details:
Access rewards faster PLUS you could earn a free certification! We are not only simplifying our pricing structure with every day low prices, we are also simplifying our loyalty program to give you greater
flexibility. Now you can redeem your points for any Arizona Natural Selections medicated products at a few key point levels. Save up enough and you could receive a free certification and Arizona Natural
Selections products to the value of $150 to take the edge off you covering your state fees. 

Our new program maintains the existing points you have accrued, so check how many points you have and you’ll see you can claim bigger rewards even faster!

Refer a friend and you both get 250 points!

And when you bring in your Arizona Natural Selections tube, you still get your five points, every time. 
Thank you for being a loyal patient!


Points - Reward:
3750 - $150 Store Credit* + Free Certification**
2500 - $150 Store Credit*
1000 - $55 Store Credit*
500 - $25 Store Credit*
250 - $10 Store Credit*

 *Store Credit Rules:
-Arizona Natural Selections’ medicated products only
-Patients must redeem entire store credit at the time of redemption

**Free Certification Rules:
-Certification includes the certification itself and filing of the paperwork
-Exclusions include acquiring doctors records/pain examinations and $150 state fee
-Patients will have the option to choose from select certification centers
-Specific dates may not be available

Loyalty Program subject to change at any time

specials.title: New Loyalty Program!
specials.details:
Access rewards faster PLUS you could earn a free certification! We are not only simplifying our pricing structure with every day low prices, we are also simplifying our loyalty program to give you greater
flexibility. Now you can redeem your points for any Arizona Natural Selections medicated products at a few key point levels. Save up enough and you could receive a free certification and Arizona Natural
Selections products to the value of $150 to take the edge off you covering your state fees. 

Our new program maintains the existing points you have accrued, so check how many points you have and you’ll see you can claim bigger rewards even faster!

Refer a friend and you both get 250 points!

And when you bring in your Arizona Natural Selections tube, you still get your five points, every time. 
Thank you for being a loyal patient!

specials.title: Online Pre-Ordering (Available from 8:30am to 6:30pm Mon-Sat and 8:30am - 4:30pm Sundays) at http://tbkr.co/mwc
specials.details:
In a hurry? You can now pre-order your meds online before you come in! After you place your order, we will put it together and send you a text when it is ready!

Go to http://tbkr.co/mwc and follow these steps:
1. Click "I Am Over 21" or "I Am 18 With a Med Card".
2. Click "I have an AZ Med Card".
3. Sign Up / Log In before you start adding items to your cart (top right corner).
4. In your profile, make sure the box next to "I have a medical card" is checked.
5. Add items to your cart and you are ready to place your order!
specials.fine_print:

specials.title: New Loyalty Program
specials.details:
Access rewards faster PLUS you could earn a free certification! We are not only simplifying our pricing structure with every day low prices, we are also simplifying our loyalty program to give you greater
flexibility. Now you can redeem your points for any Arizona Natural Selections medicated products at a few key point levels. Save up enough and you could receive a free certification and Arizona Natural
Selections products to the value of $150 to take the edge off you covering your state fees. 

Our new program maintains the existing points you have accrued, so check how many points you have and you’ll see you can claim bigger rewards even faster!

Refer a friend and you both get 250 points!

And when you bring in your Arizona Natural Selections tube, you still get your five points, every time. 
Thank you for being a loyal patient!

specials.details: 15% off of all vape products! 15% off of new featured products!  $9 per gram for all top tier flower from 12-3pm! (Limit: 7 Grams Total)

specials.title: Munchie, Medical, Madness Monday
specials.details: 15% off of your entire OMMP medical purchase. 10% off of one edible, 15% off of two edibles, 20% off of three edibles!  20% off of all vendor prerolls.

specials.title: Wake and Bake Sale
specials.details: Monday through Friday, 9AM to 11AM, get 10% off of any flower purchase.  (Prerolls not included.)

specials.title: Three Roll & Throwback Thursday
specials.details:
Get any three ½ gram house prerolls for $9 after tax every Thursday!
Deeply discounted selected flower strains.
specials.fine_print: Limit of six prerolls eligible for deal per customer.

specials.title: Full Ounce & Follow Us Friday
specials.details: 15% off any full ounce of flower purchased, and get 10% off when you show that you are following us on Instagram, Facebook, Leafly, etc.

specials.title: Waxy & Wellness Wednesday
specials.details: 10% off of any topical, tincture, RSO, or CBD purchases.  10% off of one gram of shatter, 15% off of two grams, and 20% off of three grams or more.  15% off of any half-ounce of flower.

specials.title: Shatterday Saturday
specials.details: 15% off of a quarter ounce (or more) of flower purchased. 5 grams of BHOmbChelly's wax/shatter for $50.  5 grams of Tree Honey wax/shatter for $50.  All other brands of wax/shatter:  2 grams for $10 off, 3 grams for $15 off, 4 grams for $20 off, and 5 grams for $25 off!
specials.fine_print: Limit: Maximum of 5 grams of shatter per customer per OLCC purchasing limits.

specials.details:
15% off all indica flower every Sunday!

specials.details: At Cannabis and Glass eighths start as low as $10 and are no more than $28. You can mix and match 8 beautiful bags of 3.5g to create your custom ounce. Come see why everyone agrees that C&G is the place to be!

specials.title: Save up to $30 with our Mix and Match oil grams! Over 125 different grams to choose from!

Take a look at some of our economically priced grams and save! Over 125 different strains at $12-$30! Crumble, Shatter, Sugar wax, C&G has something for everyone!

specials.title: Eighths from $10 - $28! Over 160 different strains to choose from!
specials.details: Our invigorating sativa strain Jack Skellington is fast-acting and delivers energizing, and creative effects. Those who have tried it say that the buzzy effects and pungent aroma leaves the consumer with a happy high full of giggles. Perfect for the day-time consumer, and pesticide free!. If you're looking to mellow out. We have a huge selection of indicas to put anyone in the couch!  Just ask one of our experienced budtenders!

These candies and chocolates deliver a powerful punch of both flavor and THC into your system. They are an exceptional portable treat that are subtle enough to be taken anywhere. Enjoy the positive vibes and incredible body high that these confectioneries bring for only $20 per 10 pack, a total of 100 milligrams per box. We have CBD options as well! Just two of these delectable treats would be more than enough for the typical edible enthusiast to have a long lasting experience. 

Come choose from gummies, hard candies, chocolates, and more! C&G is the 21+ candy store!

specials.title: DONATIONS | This Quarter Supporting: Helping Hands for Freedom
specials.details:
Here at Emerald Phoenix, we give back to the community by donating all proceeds from our karma jars. Every quarter we choose a new foundation to give these donations and we appreciate all that our patients donate. Emerald then matches these donations.

We're supporting Helping Hands for Freedom this quarter!

MISSION
Helping Hands for Freedom is dedicated to supporting Gold Star and military families and children facing a service member's injury, loss or deployment. Helping Hands for Freedom aims to improve children's lives through compassion, honor, mentorship and leadership.

VISION
Helping Hands is devoted to serving men, women and children who are most in need. They address the gaps in the military and government's support for the immediate needs facing our surviving families, our wounded service members, and military families facing deployment through our Life Needs Program.
In assisting children, Helping Hands for Freedom focuses on Life Enrichment programs as well as Sports & Education camps that provide community support and help to develop military children into strong and productive citizens and leaders of tomorrow.
The Dream Chaser Program allows Helping Hands for Freedom to fulfill a dream for a military child that has lost a parent due to war. Helping Hands for Freedom is supported by partner organizations to make this dream become a reality.

VALUES
Helping Hands for Freedom consistently develops programs that support communities across the country throughout the calendar year and responsibly allocates funds to those to address the needs of our military families.
